title: Textile, 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: fancy compound satin weave
creditline: Gift of Mrs. R. Keith Kane from the Estate of Mrs. Robert B. Noyes
description: Pattern of alternating stripes in plain and fancy satin weave with leaf forms superimposed. Both warps and wefts of same off-white color. Pattern achieved only by variation on weave.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 19th century.
19th century. Medium: silk
Technique: fancy compound satin weave. Gift of Mrs. R. Keith Kane from the Estate of Mrs. Robert B. Noyes. 1943-5-12.
